Question 7
  Failure: Something is wrong. Executing the following instruction sequence:
     | let module V = VarSet() in
     | let observed = V.pick() in
     | begin match observed with
     | | None   -> ()
     | | Some x -> raise (ExpectedNoneGotSome x)
     | end
     | ()caused the following exception to be raised:
         [ExpectedNoneGotSome(1)]
